perturbation.original_text: Annual Business Plan. The Agent shall perform some or all of the following duties and obligations within the parameters and to the extent required to implement the Annual Business Plan approved by the Steering Committee:
perturbation.changed_text: Annual Business Plan. The Agent shall perform some or all of the following duties and obligations within the parameters and to the extent required to implement the Annual Business Plan unilaterally created by the Agent:
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the entire management structure in Article 4 which requires Monsanto's Steering Committee to approve the Annual Business Plan. It creates uncertainty as to who controls the Agent's obligations.

perturbation.original_text: During the term of this Agreement, Monsanto covenants and agrees to first offer (the "Product Offer") to the Agent, with respect to the Included Markets, the exclusive agency and distribution rights to any newly created non-selective herbicide product, which is not marketed for Lawn and Garden Use as of the date of this Agreement, and which Monsanto, in its exclusive, reasonable discretion, determines to be suitable for sale as a new product for Lawn and Garden Use (the "New Product"); provided, however, that for the Lawn and Garden Market, that any new product containing Glyphosate or another non- selective herbicide shall be considered to be a New Product.
perturbation.changed_text: During the term of this Agreement, Monsanto may, at its sole discretion, choose whether or not to offer (the "Product Offer") to the Agent, with respect to the Included Markets, the exclusive agency and distribution rights to any newly created non-selective herbicide product, which is not marketed for Lawn and Garden Use as of the date of this Agreement, and which Monsanto, in its exclusive, reasonable discretion, determines to be suitable for sale as a new product for Lawn and Garden Use (the "New Product"); provided, however, that for the Lawn and Garden Market, that any new product containing Glyphosate or another non- selective herbicide may not be considered a New Product. The inclusion of any new product is at Monsanto's complete discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates that Monsanto offers new products to the Agent first. The changed text makes it discretionary and potentially excludes Glyphosate-based products, causing contractual inconsistency.

perturbation.original_text: Each Program Year the Agent shall make a fixed contribution to the overall Expenses of the Roundup L&G Business in an amount equal to eighteen million U.S. Dollars ($18,000,000) ("Contribution Payment"). Such Contribution Payment shall be payable by the Agent to Monsanto in twelve equal monthly installments which shall be due on the first day of each month and shall not be subject to any "set-off".
perturbation.changed_text: Each Program Year the Agent may, at its sole discretion, contribute to the overall Expenses of the Roundup L&G Business in an amount that the Agent deems necessary. Any such Contribution Payment, if made, shall be determined by the Agent based on its assessment of the program's expenses, in monthly installments that the Agent finds suitable, and may be subject to adjustments or "set-off" as determined by the Agent.
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the fixed nature of the 'Contribution Payment', making it optional and altering payment terms. It contradicts the established financial obligations and creates uncertainty about payment obligations.
